<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">One 480V Distribution Panel. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(4)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">One 42 pole, 277V lighting panel. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(5)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">One transformer, 150 KVA, for entire floor. Tenant allocation will be up to 5 watts per usable square foot. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="21%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(6)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Two 42 pole, 110V power panels with feeds and plug-in slots, and without breakers. Tenant shall be entitled to use it&#146;s pro rata share of these slots. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(e) On a multi-tenanted floor, Tenant will reimburse Landlord for items 5 and 6 above on percentage of connected amps. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">8.8</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">PLUMBING </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Along with the restroom facilities on each floor, Landlord has provided two
connection points at each end of the floor comprised of a 4&#148; sanitary riser, 6&#148; vent riser and a 2&#148; cold water line for Tenant to connect its plumbing needs beyond the core. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Any work required to be performed in the Building and located outside of the Premises must be arranged with the Project Manager and done
after Business Hours at Tenant&#146;s expense. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">8.9</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">SPRINKLER SYSTEM </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) The automatic sprinkler system has been initially installed in
accordance with Landlord&#146;s standard grid pattern which will include one sprinkler head per 225 sq. ft. of open floor area for a ceiling height of +9&#146;-8&#148; above slab. Any sprinkler heads which are required to be relocated or added to
meet building code approval and/or which are required due to irregularities of Tenant&#146;s partitioning and/or ceiling design shall be paid for by Tenant. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Concealed style heads of standard white finish and white escutcheon plates matching the existing will be used in office spaces.
Combustible material will not be permitted in the plenum space. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">8.10</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">HEATING, VENTILATION&nbsp;&amp; AIR CONDITIONING </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) <U>Design standards</U>: The building
heating, ventilating and air conditioning systems shall be capable of maintaining the following design standards: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i)
Temperatures - </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:19%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">a) Winter: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:13%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Outdoor design conditions: 5 degrees F./15 MPH Winds. Inside temperature: office space + 2 degrees of 70 degrees F. minimum; service areas 60
degrees F.; truck dock 45 degrees F. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-7 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">b) Summer: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:13%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Outdoor design conditions: 89 degrees F db, 75 degrees F wb. Inside conditions: offices + 2 degrees of 75 degrees F, 50% rh + 5%. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">Note:</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">In the event there is a temperature cooling dispute between Landlord and Tenant, Landlord&#146;s responsibility shall terminate at the core wall by evaluating the adequacy of the conditioned air provided to
Tenant&#146;s distribution system. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii) Fresh air&#151;Outside air ventilation rate for office space will
be not less than 0.15 cf/min. per usable square feet. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iii) Design loads (cooling capacities): </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:21%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">a) Public lobbies to be determined by Landlord. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:21%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">b) Office Floors: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii) Lighting load contribution = 2 watts/usf of lighting with 75% of the heat contribution to room load. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iii) Miscellaneous power load contribution = 3 watts/usf. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iv) Occupancy load = 1 person per 150 usable square feet. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Heating Systems: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i) Central Plant: The primary heating source shall be a scheduled hot water system, generated by fire-tube dual fuel boilers
without side air reset, the plant is located at the Penthouse Mechanical Equipment Room. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii) Office Floors: Hot water
shall be distributed to perimeter base board radiators. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) Ventilating&nbsp;&amp; air conditioning: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i) Central Plant Equipment: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:21%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">a) Fresh air for ventilation will be provided from a central air system located at the 15th Floor M.E.R. and Penthouse M.E.R.
with vertical distribution to each floor. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:21%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">b) Chilled water for office space air conditioning shall be generated by high
efficiency electric drive, centrifugal refrigeration machines, free-cooling plate heat exchangers, condenser water pumps and chilled water pumps located at the 15th floor mechanical equipment room. Base building chilled water shall be distributed to
air conditioning units on each floor. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-8 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii) Office floors: Office space conditioned air shall be delivered by
recirculating medium pressure variable air volume air conditioning units located in the core providing conditioned air on each floor. Each unit shall consist of recirculating supply air fan, filters, cooling coil, sound attenuation and controls.
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iii) Smoke Control: The building toilet exhaust vertical shaft shall be utilized as a central office tower smoke exhaust
through smoke emergency automatic dampers. Stair pressurization at each above and below grade exit stair as required by code. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d)
Building Management System: HVAC Control and monitoring, energy management programs, life safety, and security shall be provided. (There shall be a stand-alone fire alarm system that shall provide life safety information to the BMS.) </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">8.10.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Single Tenant Floor </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Landlord has provided one air handling unit on each floor. Tenant
shall provide its own design, VAV boxes and ductwork from the designated tap points provided by the Landlord at the core walls. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">8.10.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Multi Tenanted Floor </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Landlord has provided one air handling unit on each floor for all
tenants occupying that floor. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Landlord has provided the medium pressure duct system for Tenant to tap it&#146;s low pressure duct
work into. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) Landlord has provided a pneumatic system tap point for operation of Tenant thermostats and VAV boxes. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) Tenant will reimburse Landlord for item 2 and 3 above on a percentage of connected C.F.M. to their space. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">8.11</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">TELEPHONE SERVICE </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Landlord has made available to Tenant two different telephone service
feeds. One is provided by NJ Bell located in the telephone closet at the service elevator lobby and one feed is from the Teleport switch also servicing the project. The connection to either of these services is, at the option of Tenant, and is the
sole responsibility of the Tenant. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">8.12</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">FIRE ALARM SYSTEM </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Landlord has provided a Class C fire alarm system on each floor
connected back to a central fire alarm panel located in the main lobby. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Landlord has provided on the floor around the core the
following: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i) Two exit signs located at the exit stairs. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii) Three smoke detectors. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-9 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iii) Six speaker/strobe alarm annunciators. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iv) One connection point for Tenant needs for security system or addition of safety systems. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) If one of the six speaker/strobes is located within the Premises, Tenant will relocate to meet code at Tenant&#146;s expense. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) If additional speaker/strobes are required, Tenant will provide for additional amplification for the Premises. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">8.13</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">SECURITY SYSTEM </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Landlord has provided electric locking system at each stair tower door
that does not allow entry to any floor when in the stair tower. This system will disengage in a building emergency. Also, the main lobby doors are locked after hours and require a card key for access. Contact Property Management for access to this
system. Beyond this point Tenant is responsible for securing the Premises. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">8.14</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">SIGN CRITERIA </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Landlord has designed a signage system for multi-tenanted floors. This includes
lobby identification and direction and hallway entry door sign designs. Refer to standard detail for further information. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Landlord&#146;s Work is
described in the foregoing sections. All other items of work not included within Landlord&#146;s Work, shall be deemed to be Tenant&#146;s Work. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>9.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B>DESCRIPTION OF TENANT&#146;S WORK AND DESIGN CRITERIA </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">CODES </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Tenant will comply with by all codes that relate to the building. The codes as described
in &#147;<B><U>Landlord&#146;s Work</U></B>&#148; are for reference only and are not to be construed as all the required codes for 101 Hudson Street. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">STRUCTURAL </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Any alterations and/or additions and reinforcements to Landlord&#146;s
structure required to accommodate Tenant&#146;s Work shall be Tenant&#146;s responsibility. Any costs, including the cost of Landlord&#146;s review, associated with such structural alterations shall be Tenant&#146;s responsibility. The plans for
such alterations shall be subject to the Landlord&#146;s prior written approval. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Maximum concentrated loads on all levels will not
exceed 100 lbs. per square foot unless approved by Landlord. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) The size of existing framing measures to be verified by Tenant for any
clearance problem. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-10 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">FLOORS </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Carpeting, either broadloom or carpet tile, of not less than 32 oz. Face Weight
goods will be used. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Vinyl composition tile of not less than commercial grade. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) Base can be either 4&#148; cove, straight vinyl or carpet base with vinyl cap. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) Other materials may be used with Landlord&#146;s consent. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">PARTITIONS </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.4.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Construction </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Inspace walls will be 5/8&#148; Type X gypsum board on 2 1/2&#148;, 25 GA.
metal studs at 16&#148; on center, meeting the General Product Applications and Construction Standard as outlined in the United States Gypsum Construction Handbook, 2nd Edition. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) All toilet room partitions and kitchen partitions shall have water resistant gypsum board in addition to washable surface abutting these
surfaces. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.4.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Finishes </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Gypsum board walls will have the standard three coat joint application as
outlined in the United States Gypsum Construction Handbook. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) All corners and exposed edges will receive a metal or plastic trim
spackled with three coats and sanded following the United States Gypsum Handbook. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">CEILING </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) The ceiling heights in the office area are set by the height of the window system
+/- 9&#146;-8&#148; nominally 9&#146;8&#148; above the slab. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) The standard ceiling type is a 2 X 2 grid that will be used throughout
the Premises. Grid support wire will be installed at 24&#148; o.c. each way and wires will be provided for each light fixture. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) Screw
connections of wall angles to the window system is not permitted. Refer to Appendix C for installation instruction. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) Gypsum board
ceiling will be permitted as long as there are access panels to isolated HVAC equipment and they meet the United States Gypsum Construction Standards. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(e) All items installed in plenum space are to be properly rated. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.6</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">DOORS AND HARDWARE </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.6.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Single Tenant Floors </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Landlord has provided certain doors and hardware on each floor. Refer to Landlord&#146;s
Work. Beyond this, Tenant must provide the following: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Doors in the Premises will be 3&#146; X 8&#146; solid core doors with plain
sliced red oak veneer paint or stain grade, mounted on hollow metal knock down frames field painted. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-11 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Hardware will be building standard as noted in Appendix &#147;D&#148;. Each door will have
three (3)&nbsp;butts, a passage or lockset, floor stops and silencers. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.6.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Multi Tenanted Floors </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Landlord may have provided certain doors and hardware on each floor,
refer to Landlord&#146;s Work. Beyond this, Tenant must provide the following: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Entry doors to space will be 3&#146; X 8&#146; solid
core &#147;C&#148; label plain sliced red oak stained on the corridor side to match building standard. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Doors in the Premises space
will be 3&#146; X 8&#146; solid core doors with plain sliced berch veneer paint grade mounted on hollow metal knock down frames field painted. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) Hardware will be building standard as noted in Appendix D. Each door will have three (3)&nbsp;butts, a passage or lockset, floor stops
and silencers. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) Where Tenant relocates or cuts in a door and frame, Tenant will restore the floor and wall conditions to building
standard. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.7</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">ELECTRICAL </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.7.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Single Tenant Floors </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Landlord has provided certain electrical services to each floor,
refer to Landlord&#146;s Work. Beyond this, Tenant must provide the following: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i) Transformer service with a minimum of
5 watts per square foot and all related connections to existing floor service. Refer to Appendix C for more information. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii) 110V power panels as required by Tenant but not less than two (2)&nbsp;panel house, 42 poles and not less than 200 amp
feed each. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iii) Circuit breaker and feed runs to devices, B.X. cable is acceptable only when the runs are grouped and
secured to the structure. Circuit runs will not be allowed to rest on sprinkler pipes, duct work or ceiling system. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Tenant will
connect through the PSE&amp;G electric meter on the floor provided by Landlord. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) Tenant shall not install any light fixtures within
five (5)&nbsp;feet of the exterior window wall. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) Tenant&#146;s electrical contractor shall comply with the all applicable editions of
the National Electrical Code and all local codes and ordinances. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(e) All wiring will be copper and comply with local codes. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-12 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.7.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Multi Tenanted Floor </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Landlord has provided certain electrical services to each floor,
refer to Landlord&#146;s Work. Beyond this, Tenant must provide the following: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i) From the 277V lighting panel and 110V
power panel, Tenant will provide circuit breakers and branch circuits to the Tenant&#146;s space and all electrical devices required by Tenant. B.X. Cable is acceptable only when the runs are grouped and secured to the structure. Circuit runs will
not be allowed to rest on sprinkler pipes, duct work or ceiling systems. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Tenant shall not install any light fixtures within five
(5)&nbsp;feet of the exterior window wall. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) Tenant&#146;s electrical contractor shall comply with the all applicable editions of the
National Electrical Code and all local codes and ordinances. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) All wiring will be copper and comply with local codes. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.8</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">PLUMBING </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Landlord has provided for two soil and ventstack locations on each floor for the
use of the Tenant as required. Tenant will review space for the exact location. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Cold water line connection can be made at wet
columns. Multi tenanted floor will tee off existing valve with its own valve and leave caped at 4&#148; pipe for the next tenant, refer to Appendix C for details. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) Miscellaneous Plumbing Requirements: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i) Tenant may locate a toilet anywhere on the floor at Tenant&#146;s expense, subject to Building Codes, with prior approval
by the Landlord. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii) Kitchen sink will be stainless steel commercial grade with commercial grade faucets. Sinks can be
either cold only or hot and cold. Heated water can come from either tank type water heater concealed in the ceiling or under the counter, or an Insta-Hot installed under the counter. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iii) Tenant must use low flow, quiet flush water closets and urinals, as approved by the Building Department. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iv) Hot water &#147;pop-off&#148; valve options: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:21%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">a) Pop-off valve drain line can terminate into slop sink, floor sink or other approved Building Department locations, but not
into a floor drain. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:21%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">b) Water heaters can set, and pop-off into, a sealed sheet metal pan. Pan shall have drain line to a
&#147;Y&#148; tail section of lavatory waste pipe, as approved by the Building Department. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-13 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.9</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">SPRINKLER SYSTEM </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Landlord has provided the base sprinkler system as Landlord&#146;s Work.
This system has been designed with provisions for expansion in the number of heads on each pipe. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) The Tenant will use the existing
heads and if additional heads are required, Tenant will use the standard building head, which is &#147;Reliable D-1.&#148; </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) All
alterations to Landlord&#146;s system must be submitted to Landlord&#146;s underwriter for review and approval. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) The Building
Inspector shall be the final authority as to where and how many heads are required by the code. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(e) All sprinkler work shall be
performed in accordance with the following regulatory agencies but not limited to: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i) The State of New Jersey Uniform
Construction Code 1990 </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii) BOCA Basic Mechanical Code 1990 </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iii) BOCA Basic Building Code 1990 </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iv) NFPA Standard 13 Sprinkler System 1990 </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(v) Fire Insurance Underwriters for the Building </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(f) Shut down of the system requires a 48 hour notice to the Building Manager, there are no exceptions. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.10</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">HEATING, VENTILATION&nbsp;&amp; AIR CONDITIONING </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.10.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Single Tenant Floor </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Landlord has provided certain HVAC services to each floor, refer to
Landlord&#146;s Work. Beyond this, Tenant must provide the following: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i) Medium pressure ductwork distribution system
from the tap point at the core walls. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii) Low pressure ductwork distribution to VAV Boxes. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iii) Flex distribution to supply air registers in ceiling. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iv) Connection to pneumatic control system and distribution to VAV the thermostats. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="16%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.10.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Multi Tenanted Floors </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Landlord has provided certain HVAC service to each floor, refer to
Landlord&#146;s Work. Beyond this point, Tenant must provide the following: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Low pressure ductwork and taps to existing medium
pressure ductwork and VAV Box. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-14 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Flex distribution to supply air register in ceiling. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) Connection to pneumatic control system at the side of the medium pressure ductwork and distribution to VAV and thermostat. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.11</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">TELEPHONE SERVICE </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Landlord has provided certain telephone service to the floor, refer to
Landlord&#146;s Work. Beyond this point, Tenant must provide its own system and make arrangements for service to the Premises and all wire, plugs and connection panels as Tenant may require. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Tenant will only be allowed to use plenum rate cable in the building and all wires will be suspended from the structure. No wires will be
allowed to rest on ceiling system, duct work or sprinkler pipes. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.12</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">FIRE ALARM SYSTEM </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Landlord has provided certain systems to each floor, refer to
Landlord&#146;s Work. Beyond this, Tenant must provide its own upgrade to the system. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(i) Relocation of existing
speaker/strobe units as they effect Tenant&#146;s design and space. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(ii) Additional speaker/strobe units as requires per
code&nbsp;&amp; wired back to Landlord&#146;s connection point on the floor. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iii) Smoke detector units as required per
code and wired back to Landlord&#146;s connection point on the floor. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(iv) Fire alarm pull stations as required per code
and wired back to Landlord&#146;s connection point on the floor. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:17%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(v) All connections to Landlord fire alarm system will
be performed by Landlord&#146;s contractor at Tenant&#146;s expense. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.13</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">SECURITY SYSTEM </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Landlord has provided certain systems to each floor and the building, refer to
Landlord&#146;s Work. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Beyond the above, Tenant must make its own plans for securing the Premises. However, no security system will impede
the existing requirements of the floor or the Premises in an emergency situation. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Any electronic locks must be connected to the base
building&#146;s fire alarm system at Tenant&#146;s expense. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.14</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">SIGNAGE CRITERIA </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Landlord has designed a graphics system for the base building and all tenants
will adhere to this standard (refer to Appendix D for size and shape). Tenants that occupy one or more total floors may deviate from this criteria with Landlord&#146;s approval. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-15 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="6%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.15</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">CONSTRUCTION FACILITIES </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(a) Tenant shall remove all Tenant trash and debris to designated
trash receptacles during the construction of the Premises. Connection to temporary power including all temporary power lines, transformers and electrical distribution is Tenant&#146;s responsibility and shall be removed upon completion of the
Premises. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(b) Plan check, building permits, sewer connection charges and other City, County and State charges in connection with all of
Tenant&#146;s Work shall be at Tenant&#146;s expense. The design and quality of all work and installations undertaken by Tenant on the Premises shall be subject to the approval of the Landlord in accordance with all City, County, and State
ordinances, rules and regulations. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(c) Tenant&#146;s contractor shall be responsible for obtaining all Building, Health&nbsp;&amp; Fire
Department and any other permits required for Tenant&#146;s occupancy. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(d) Landlord&#146;s approval of final drawings does not guarantee
approval by governing authorities, and it shall be the responsibility of the Tenant to meet and comply with all National, State, and Local code requirements. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(e) Tenant&#146;s contractor will confine its materials, tools,&nbsp;&amp; work force to the Premises. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(f) All construction workers and materials will enter and exit the building via the loading dock and the service elevators. No construction
material or tradesmen will be allowed on the passenger elevators. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:17%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(g) Tenant shall coordinate its general contractor and its
subcontractors with Landlord&#146;s contractors. Conflicts between Landlord&#146;s Work and Tenant&#146;s Work shall be resolved to the benefit of the Landlord&#146;s Work, including any and all trade union issues. Tenant is responsible for
complying with the existing trade union agreements of the building. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The work to be done by Tenant in satisfying its obligation in connection with the
Lease shall not be limited to work described in the foregoing section. All other items of work not therein provided for is to be done by Tenant at its sole expense </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>10.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B>INSPECTIONS </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">It is the responsibility of the Tenant to obtain all building department final inspections
for occupancy in the Premises prior to move-in. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Certificate of Occupancy Acceptance Requirements</U>: Many questions arise to the procedures or
outline of the inspections to be conducted prior to the issuance of a temporary or permanent C.O. These items listed below will assist you in the conducting of a thorough inspection and expedite the issuance of the C.O. The lists are intended to be
illustrative and are not intended to be exclusive. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">All life safety systems should be checked thoroughly by the contractors for proper operation and
supervision for alarms. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Some of the discrepancies that are usually encountered during the walk through are as follows: </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Penetrations in rated areas </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Sprinkler valves not identified </TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-16 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Rooms not identified </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Trouble condition on fire alarm control panel not explained </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Panels and boxes not closed, nor circuits in panels not identified </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Operation of emergency systems, when fire alarm activates </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Improperly trained people to activate systems </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Additional egress lighting </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Audibility of alarm signals </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Improper spacing or insufficient smoke detectors in required areas </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Exit passageways between furniture system not to code. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Lack of fire extinguishers </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Paperwork that would be required: </U></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Architects/engineers sign off of the installation </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Contractors/sub-contractors sign off of the installation </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Sprinkler certification paperwork </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Alarm certification paperwork (if applicable) </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Fire pump calibration and test papers (if applicable) </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Elevator inspection report (if applicable) </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Permit updates </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">C.O. Application </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Flame spread rating for carpet and furniture </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Outline of procedure: </U></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#149;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Inspectors walk through area(s) for individual subcode requirements </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><U>Under normal building power: </U></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Perform operational check fire alarm activation components, i.e., manual pulls, sprinkler, smoke detectors; check for proper response if applicable: elevator
recall, stair pressurization, indication, door release, audibility, fire pump; supervision tests of sprinklers and alarms; check of voice/alarm system; check of interior phone communication system i.e., lobby, staircase, elevator; perform
operational check of elevator recall: designated level check, alternate level check, phone communication; shut down of power in building (emergency power test) if applicable; repeat all of the above; shut down of power to space; primary check exit
and emergency lighting. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Additional tests may be required for hazardous areas, computer rooms/EPO test, etc. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Prior to having the Building Department&#146;s final walk through, Tenant will notify Landlord and Project Manager and conduct a trial walk through. This
review may require activation of system, as noted above. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Notice of Building Department&#146;s final walk through must be approved by Landlord and
arranged with Landlord at least 36 hours in advance in order to notify other tenants in the Building. <U>THERE WILL BE NO EXCEPTIONS</U>! </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Inspection by
Landlord and Project Manager is not deemed to be an approval for occupancy of the Premises by Tenant. Tenant must first obtain C.O. from the Building Department. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-17 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>11.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B>POST MOVE-IN </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Typically, the occupancy of the Premises by the Tenant marks the end of the formal
association of the Project Manager and the Tenant and responsibility is passed by the Project Manager to the Building Manager. Building Management is in contact with the Tenant from receipt of the lease summary, first to explain the policies and
services of the Building Manager&#146;s office and later, to coordinate the actual move-in of the Tenant. It is therefore important that the Tenant keep the Building Manager up-to-date on the status of the move-in progress. A weekly meeting
including the Tenant, Project Manager and the Building Manager is a viable means of accomplishing this communication. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Tenant should pay close attention
to the following items. Tenant will be responsible for paying for or reimbursing the Landlord for. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Elevators: Tenant should make arrangements with the Property Management office for use of the service elevator(s) during its move. Costs associated with the elevator operation including the cost of a union elevator
operator to move fixtures and furnishings from the loading dock to Tenant&#146;s floor and a stand-by maintenance man. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Service Dock: Tenant should make arrangements with the Property Management office for berth space, time allocation and procedures. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Insurance: Tenant shall provide Landlord with Insurance Certificates additionally insuring Landlord and his agents from the Tenant&#146;s mover. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">4.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Security: Tenant will arrange for security of its Premises during the move. If Tenant elects to use Landlord&#146;s security force outside the standard security under the Lease, Tenant shall bear all costs and
responsibility. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">5.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Protection: Tenant will be responsible for protection of walls and floors in its Premises and in the common areas that Tenant may come into contact with. Any damage to the Premises or Building Common Area caused by
Tenant, its general contractor, its mover or any one else associated with Tenant will be repaired by Landlord at Tenant&#146;s cost. </TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-18 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><U>APPENDIX A-1 </U></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>PARTIAL WAIVER OF LIEN </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">WHEREAS,
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, THE UNDERSIGNED, has furnished materials or performed labor for the erection,
repair, or alteration on behalf of <B>[name Tenant]</B>, who has leased certain space at 101 Hudson Street, Jersey City, New Jersey from 101 Hudson Leasing Associates, pursuant to a contract, dated as of
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; between &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
and the undersigned, has agreed to release all liens which the undersigned has or might have on the said land and building by reason of the premises to the extent of all payments received to the date of this Partial Waiver of Lien, which payments
total&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">NOW THESE
PRESENTS WITNESS, that the undersigned, for and in consideration of the premises and of One Dollar to the undersigned is paid, the receipt thereof is hereby acknowledged, have remised, released and forever quit-claimed unto <B>[Tenant]</B>, 101
Hudson Street Associates, 101 Hudson Street Urban Renewal Associates and 101 Hudson Leasing Associates and to their heirs and assigns, any and all manner of liens, claims and demands whatsoever which the undersigned, now has or could or might have
on or against the said building and land by reason of the premises to the extent of all payments received to the date of this Partial Waiver of Lien, which payments total &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, so
that <B>[Tenant]</B>, 101 Hudson Street Associates, 101 Hudson Street Urban Renewal Associates and 101 Hudson Leasing Associates and to their heirs and assigns, shall and may have, hold and enjoy the same, freed and discharged from all liens, claims
and demands whatsoever which the undersigned now have or might or could have one or against the same, if these present had not been made to the extent of all payments received to the date of this Partial Waiver of Lien, which payments total. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned have hereunto set our hands and seals this day of </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, A.D. Two
Thousand&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Signed, sealed and
delivered in </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">the presence of </P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">


<TR>

</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">J-A-1 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><U>APPENDIX A-2 </U></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>FINAL WAIVER OF LIEN </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">WHEREAS,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; THE UNDERSIGNED, has furnished materials or performed labor for the erection, repair, or alteration on behalf of <B>[name Tenant]</B>, who has leased certain space at 101 Hudson Street, Jersey City, New Jersey,
pursuant to a contract, dated as of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, between and the undersigned, has agreed to release any and all liens which the undersigned
has or might have on the said land and building by reason of the premises. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">NOW THESE PRESENTS WITNESS, that the undersigned, for and in
consideration of the premises and of One Dollar to the undersigned is paid, the receipt thereof is hereby acknowledged, have remised, released and forever quit-claimed unto <B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
[Tenant]</B> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 101 Hudson Street Associates, 101 Hudson Urban Renewal Associates and 101 Hudson Leasing Associates and to their
heirs and assigns, any and all manner of liens, claims and demands whatsoever which the undersigned, now has or could or might have on or against <B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; [Tenant]</B>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 101 Hudson Street Associates, 101 Hudson Street Urban Renewal Associates and 101 Hudson Leasing Associates and their heirs and
assigns, shall and may have, hold and enjoy the same, freed and discharged from all liens, claims and demands whatsoever which the undersigned now have or might or could have on or against the same, if these presents had not been made. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned have hereunto set our hands and seals this day of </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Two Thousand. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">

<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
