 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">A-2 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><U>APPENDIX B </U></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>RULES AND REGULATIONS GOVERNING WORK </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>PERFORMED </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>AT 101 HUDSON
STREET </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">101 Hudson Leasing Associates hereby sets forth the following rules and regulations governing the Work to be done by the Tenant&#146;s general
contractor, its employees and any and all subcontractors employed by the general contractor, and the Tenant shall cause general contractor to comply with these rules and regulations and any changes thereto which may reasonably be made by the
Landlord. Tenant shall cause general contractor to see to it that any and all subcontractors employed by the general contractor comply with the same. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>1.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>PERMITS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Permits and licenses necessary for the execution of the work shall be
secured and paid for by Tenant. The Building Permit shall be properly posted at the job site, with a copy furnished to the Project Manager before construction commences. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>2.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>WORK AREA</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Before commencing any work, the Tenant shall have its general
contractor erect construction barriers, acceptable to Landlord, between the area where Tenant&#146;s Work is being conducted (the &#147;<B><U>Work Area</U></B>&#148;) and any public areas in the Building and will keep the Work Area closed from
public view until completion and occupancy by Tenant. The general contractor shall perform all construction activities and all storage of material inside the Work Area. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>3.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>KEYS AND LOCKS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Tenant shall have its general contractor shall provide the
Project Manager with keys to all locks installed on or in the Work Area. Project Manager will be provided access to the Work Area at all times. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>4.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>COMMON AREAS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Tenant shall have its general contractor carefully protect all
walls, carpets, ceiling tiles, floors, furniture and fixtures in the Building&#146;s Common Areas (corridors, lobbies, restrooms, service dock elevator lobbies and service elevator lobbies) or areas open to the public in relation to the movement of
material and work forces to the Work Area and the Tenant shall pay for repairs or replacement of all damaged property therein (whether caused by its general contractor or its agents or subcontractors) upon demand by the Landlord. The general
contractor will not perform any construction activities or store any materials in any Common Areas or public areas. Alterations to multi-tenant corridors (e.g., door cut-in) shall either be complete within the first week of construction or a visual
barrier (approved by the Project Manager) shall be erected at Tenant&#146;s expense. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>5.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>ELEVATORS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">All construction materials, tools and trash are to be transferred to
and from the Work Area via the freight elevator or service corridors except for construction on the ground floor where all transfers are to be done via the exterior entrances of the Premises. At no time shall the Tenant, its
</P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">B-1 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">
general contractor or its subcontractors or suppliers use the passenger elevators to move construction personnel, materials, equipment, tools or trash to and from the Work Area without the
express prior consent of Project Manager. Furthermore, the use of the freight elevator shall be scheduled by the general contractor with Project Manager. Any work or hauling of materials or trash on occupied floors shall be conducted so as to leave
unobstructed at all times the public corridors, freight elevator vestibule or passenger elevator lobby. Tenant will be responsible for the cost of a operating engineer or elevator operator during the construction period. Because the freight elevator
is the principal means of providing hoisting for services as well as construction activities, the Tenant shall instruct its general contractor to cooperate in resolving any conflicts which may arise from time to time when the general contractor is
required to share the freight elevator with the Building&#146;s cleaning crew, other tenants, etc. At no time may the Tenant, its general contractor or its subcontractors block the freight elevator door open. In the event that any damage occurs to
the freight elevator or freight elevator lobbies, the Tenant will bear the total cost of repairs. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>6.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>WATER AND ELECTRICITY DURING CONSTRUCTION</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Sources of water and electricity (in
reasonable quantities for lighting, portable power tools, drinking water, water for testing and other such common uses during construction) will be made available to the Tenant by the Landlord at a cost to the Tenant of $1.00/RSF per year prorated
for the time period of construction which shall commence at the beginning of construction and end with connection of permanent service. The general contractor shall make all connections or furnish any necessary extensions to or from such sources,
and shall be responsible for promptly removing same upon completion of the Premises. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>7.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>SANITARY FACILITIES</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">During construction of Tenant&#146;s Work, sanitary
facilities will be furnished to Tenant and its general contractor by the Project Manager. The Tenant and its general contractor shall use only those facilities specifically provided or designated by the Landlord. Charges associated with a facility,
clean-up or damage of any kind shall be the responsibility of the Tenant. Under no circumstances will restroom facilities be used by workmen to clean construction materials or tools. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>8.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>DUSTY WORK</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Tenant shall notify the Project Manager prior to commencement of
extremely dusty work (sheetrock cutting, sanding, extensive brooming, etc.)so that prior arrangements can be made for additional filtering capacity on the affected HVAC equipment. Failure to make such notification will result in the Tenant being
responsible for any costs to return the equipment to proper condition. If work is being performed for a particular tenant, that tenant shall pay for the additional construction filter. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>9.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>WORK APPROVAL</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">All drawings, change orders, subcontractors and materials must be
approved by the Project Manager prior to the start of construction and the Tenant will maintain a clean set of drawings in the Work Area at all times. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">B-2 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>10.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>DISPOSITION OF MATERIALS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Any and all trash removed and not reused in the
construction, shall be disposed of by Tenant as waste or unwanted material to a construction dumpster located in the Loading Dock. The dumpster shall be provided by Tenant at its cost. The building compactor is not to be used by any of the
Tenant&#146;s contractors. Violations will result in a charge to the Tenant. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>11.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>CLEAN UP</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Tenant shall instruct its general contractor that on a daily basis to
keep the Work Area and other related areas in the Building from accumulations of waste material, debris, dirt, dust or rubbish caused or incidental to Tenant&#146;s Work. Upon completion of the Tenant&#146;s Work, the general contractor shall
promptly remove from the Work Area, the Building and the site, all tools, scaffolding, surplus materials, trash and debris, and shall leave the site the Building and Work Area clean. Any debris, rubbish, materials or equipment left outside the Work
Area shall be disposed of by the Landlord. The cost of such disposal shall be the responsibility of Tenant. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>12.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>WORKING HOURS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Business Hours are Monday through Friday 8:00 a.m. to 6:00
p.m. except Saturday, Sunday and Holidays. There are certain operations that must be performed outside of Business Hours to prevent the interruption of other Tenant&#146;s normal business operations. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">These are: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">a.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Drilling or cutting of the concrete floor-slab. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">b.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Drilling or cutting of any concrete or metal structural member. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">c.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Any work where machine noise or vibration may disrupt normal office procedures. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">d.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Electrical connections require a shut off of service to other tenants. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">All work performed
outside Business Hours must be scheduled and approved by the Project Manager and Building Manager and all cost associated with this work will be borne by Tenant including costs incurred by Landlord for Project Manager, Building engineer and security
personnel. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>13.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>WORKMAN CONDUCT</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">No loud or abusive language or actions or the playing of music
that can be heard outside the Work Area will be tolerated. Clothing worn by workers must be free of offensive symbols or slogans. It will be the responsibility of the Tenant and its general contractor to enforce this regulation on a day-to-day basis
and/or in response to specific complaints from Building Manager. Landlord or Building Manager may cause the job to be shutdown if any complaints are received by Landlord or Building Manager and are not promptly corrected by Tenant. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>14.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>WORKMEN ENTRANCE/DELIVERIES</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">All workmen will enter the Building at the Loading
Dock and sign in with Building security to receive a pass to work on certain floors. The Tenant and its general contractor will provide the Project Manager, before beginning any construction work, with a list of subcontractors and
</P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">B-3 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">
foremen names for the Project. All deliveries of materials must be made to the service Loading Dock located on York Street. Delivery vehicles have a 30 minute parking limit. All delivery
personnel must check in with the Dock Master prior to using any berth in the dock. Those who abuse this privilege are subject to being towed away at Tenant&#146;s or the vehicle owner&#146;s expense. Any major non-Business Hour deliveries of
supplies or materials must be approved and scheduled in writing with the Project Manager not less than three (3)&nbsp;days prior to such delivery. Any cost arising out of failure to approve and schedule through the Project Manager will be billed to
the Tenant. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>15.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>BASE BUILDING ELECTRICAL PANEL CHANGES</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">All additional electrical circuits added
to existing electrical panels or any new circuits added to new electrical panels will be appropriately marked as to the area and/or equipment serviced by the circuit(s) in question as provided for in specifications. All electrical panels which have
covers removed for any reason (e.g. so as to allow the addition of new circuits) or any new electrical panels which are installed shall be left at the end of each day with all panel covers properly in place and all panel doors securely closed. Under
no circumstances will power serving other tenants&#146; premises or other areas of the Building be shut off without the specific advance written notice and approval of the Project Manager. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>16.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>SPECIAL ELEVATOR SERVICES</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Any work or repair that necessitates or involves the
following must be scheduled in advance with the Project Manager. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">a.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Access to the top of an elevator cab. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">b.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Utilization of an elevator cab to perform special services. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">c.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Work on or in any elevator cab servicing the Building. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">A five (5)&nbsp;day notice regarding
such proposed activities should be given so as to allow the Project Manager to arrange with the Building&#146;s elevator installer or service contractor to provide personnel to perform or supervise such activities. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Under no circumstances should the Tenant or its general contractor permit their personnel to utilize the elevator facilities for any purpose
other than the approved transport of materials and/or personnel. Tenant will be responsible for any extra costs incurred by the Landlord including Project Manager, security, Building engineer, union trades, etc. resulting from or in connection with
such use of the Building&#146;s elevators by Tenant or its general contractor or its subcontractors. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>17.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>WELDING/CUTTING TORCH USE</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">No welding/cutting torch or arc welding equipment is
to be used in the Building without prior approval of Project Manager. If such approval is granted by Building Management, the general contractor must have a fire extinguisher present in the Work Area at all times when the equipment is being used.
Additionally, the Tenant and its general contractor may be required to perform all such work during non-Business Hours because of the fumes which may be associated with such welding. Tenant and its general contractor shall take efforts to protect
life safety system from activating, and if a false alarm is signaled, Tenant will be charged $1,000.00 for each incident. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">B-4 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>18.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>USE OF VARNISHES/LACQUER AND SOLVENT BASED COATINGS IN THE BUILDING</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">No use of
varnishes, lacquers, solvent based coatings or glue are to be used in the Building without the prior approval of the Project Manager. This type of work should be done off-site. Anyone found using these compounds in or around the Building without the
approval of the Project Manager will be required to cease such work and Tenant shall pay all costs required to ventilate the floor or floors. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>19.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>PAINT AND COMBUSTIBLES</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">All paint and other flammable materials will be stored in
approved sealed containers. A fire extinguisher will be placed in the area where flammable materials are used or stored. &#147;No Smoking&#148; signs will be posted near electrical, and strictly adhered to. All rags will be stored in approved
containers which prevent combustion. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>20.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>DRAINING AND FILLING OF SPRINKLER LINES</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Any work which will involve the draining
of a sprinkler line or otherwise affect the Building&#146;s sprinkler system must be approved in advance by Project Manager and Building Management. In all instances where this is done, the system may not be left inoperable overnight. Draining and
filling of the systems is only allowed during the hours of 8:00 a.m. - 11:30 a.m. and 1:30 p.m. - 4:00 p.m. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">De-energizing of the system
related to drainage of the sprinkler lines will be done in the presence of Building Management personnel in conjunction with Tenant&#146;s sprinkler subcontractor. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>21.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>FIRE ALARM SYSTEM</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">When Tenant&#146;s Work interferes with the fire alarm system
wiring, connections to this system must be performed by or under the direct supervision of the Building engineers or its designated representatives. The Tenant or its general contractor must contact the Project Manager prior approval to commencing
such activity. If system is activated and false alarm is signaled, Tenant will be charged $1000.00 for each event. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>22.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>LIGHT BULB AND BALLASTS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Tenant is responsible for ensuring that all light
fixtures in the Work Area are working properly and are fully lit upon job completion. This includes replacement of tubes and ballasts as required in light fixtures that are replaced, added or repositioned. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>23.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>GOVERNING BODY</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Tenant is responsible for complying with all Federal, State
and Local Building Codes and Laws which are in effect. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>24.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>ASBESTOS-CONTAINING MATERIALS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">No asbestos-containing materials shall be allowed
to be installed in any areas of the Building. Tenant and its general contractor shall verify that no material used in the work performed under its contract contains asbestos fibers. An MSDS sheet must be submitted for all products used. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">B-5 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>25.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>POSTING OF RULES AND REGULATIONS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">A copy of these rules and regulations,
acknowledged and accepted by the Tenant and general contractor, must be posted at the Premises in a location clearly visible to all workers. It is the Tenant and its general contractor&#146;s responsibility to instruct his employees and all
subcontractors to familiarize themselves with these rules and to enforce compliance with these rules at all times. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>26.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>SMOKING ON FLOORS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">No smoking will be allowed in the Common Areas of the Building
or in any occupied tenant space. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>27.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>NON-COMPLIANCE</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Non-compliance with these regulations will result in the possible
barring of the Tenant&#146;s general contractor from current or future activities in the Building. Any costs incurred by Landlord in cleaning the Building or Work Area or repairing damage resulting from the General Contractor&#146;s activities
(including the activities of any of the General Contractor&#146;s employees or subcontractors) will be the responsibility of Tenant. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>28.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>TRADES</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">All work performed in the building will be done by union forces following
all the applicable union agreements in force for the area that the building is located in. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>29.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>COSTS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">All costs or expenses chargeable to Tenant pursuant to these Rules and
Regulations shall be deemed to be Additional Rent and payable within ten (10)&nbsp;days of Tenant&#146;s receipt of invoice therefor. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>30.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>DELEGATION</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Tenant may, as between Tenant and its general contractor, delegate
its responsibilities under these Rules and Regulations to its general contractor. Notwithstanding such delegations, Tenant shall be responsible and liable to Landlord for the proper performance and enforcement of the Rules and Regulations. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">These rules do not release the Tenant or its General Contractor from complying with all federal, state and local code and laws and or any provisions in the
Lease. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">ACKNOWLEDGED AND ACCEPTED BY: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">(Must be an officer
of the company) </P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">B-6 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><U>APPENDIX D </U></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>REQUIRED PRODUCT FOR USE IN THE BUILDING </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>1.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>ELECTRICAL SYSTEMS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">a.</TD>

YEAR&#146;S DAY * </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>* MEMORIAL DAY * </B></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>SCHEDULE L </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">Existing Furniture </P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g128818g72z96.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
 </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">L-1 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><U>FIRST AMENDMENT TO LEASE </U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>1.0)</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>PARTIES</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">THIS AGREEMENT made the
4<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP> day of May. 2011 is by and between 101 HUDSON LEASING ASSOCIATES (hereinafter &#147;Landlord&#148;) New Jersey general partnership, whose address is c/o Mack-Cali Realty Corporation. 343
Thornall Street, 8<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP> Floor, Edison, New Jersey 08837-2206 and OPTIMER PHARMACEUTICALS, INC. (hereinafter &#147;Tenant&#148;), a Delaware corporation, whose address is 10110 Sorrento Valley Road,
Suite C. San Diego. California 92121. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>2.0</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>STATEMENT OF FACTS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord and Tenant entered into a Lease dated February&nbsp;9. 2011 (hereinafter &#147;Lease&#148;) setting forth the terms of occupancy by Tenant of 14,196 rentable square feet on the thirty-fifth (35<SUP
STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;floor (hereinafter &#147;Premises&#148;) at 101 Hudson Street, Jersey City, New Jersey (hereinafter &#147;Building&#148;); and </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The Term of the Lease commences on the Commencement Date as defined in the Reference Page and ends on the last day of the month in which occurs the day immediately before the fifth (5th)&nbsp;anniversary of the Rent
Commencement Date as defined in Paragraph (s)&nbsp;of the Reference Page; and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">It has been determined that March&nbsp;7, 2011 is the Commencement Date of the Term of the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>3.0</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>STATEMENT OF TERMS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the Premises and the
covenants hereinafter set forth, it is agreed: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The Commencement Date of the Term of the Lease is March&nbsp;7, 2011 and the Expiration Date of the Term is June&nbsp;30. 2016 and Paragraph (e)&nbsp;of the Reference Page is modified accordingly. The Rent Commencement
Dale is June&nbsp;7. 2011. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant hereby represents to Landlord that (i)&nbsp;there exists no default under the Lease either by Tenant or Landlord: and (ii)&nbsp;there exists no offset, defense or counterclaim to Tenant&#146;s obligations under
the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">This Agreement is executed by the parties hereto for the purpose of providing a record of the Commencement Date, the Rent Commencement Date and Expiration Date of the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant&#146;s failure to sign this Agreement and return same to Landlord within ten (10)&nbsp;days after Tenant&#146;s receipt of this Agreement shall be deemed to be Tenant&#146;s acceptance of the Commencement Date,
the Rent Commencement Date and Expiration Date as stated in this Agreement. </TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">EXCEPT as modified herein, the Lease covering the Premises shall remain in full force and effect
as if the same were set forth in full herein and Landlord and Tenant hereby ratify and confirm all the terms and conditions thereof. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">THIS
AGREEMENT shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective legal representatives, successors and permitted assigns. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">EACH PARTY AGREES that it will not raise or assert as a defense to any obligation under the Lease or this Agreement or make any claim that the
Lease or this Agreement is invalid or unenforceable due to any failure of this document to comply with ministerial requirements including, but not limited to, requirements for corporate seals, attestations, witnesses, notarizations, or other similar
requirements, and each party hereby waives the right to assert any such defense or make any claim of invalidity or unenforceability due to any of the foregoing, </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">This Agreement may be executed in multiple counterparts, each of which, when assembled to include an original signature for each party
contemplated to sign this Agreement, will constitute a complete and fully executed original. All such fully executed counterparts will collectively constitute a single agreement. Tenant expressly agrees that if the signature of Landlord and/or
Tenant on this Agreement is not an original, but is a digital, mechanical or electronic reproduction (such as, but not limited to, a photocopy, fax, e-mail, PDF, Adobe image, JPEG, telegram, telex or telecopy), then such digital, mechanical or
electronic reproduction shall be as enforceable, valid and binding as, and the legal equivalent to, an authentic and traditional ink-on-paper original wet signature penned manually by its signatory </P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">IN WITNESS THEREOF, Landlord and Tenant have hereunto set their hands the date and year first
above written and acknowledge one to the other they possess the requisite authority to enter into this transaction and to sign this Agreement. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><U>SECOND AMENDMENT TO LEASE </U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>PARTIES</U></B> </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">THIS AGREEMENT made the 5th day of July, 2011 is by and between 101 HUDSON STREET ASSOCIATES (&#147;Landlord&#148;) whose address is c/o Mack-Cali Realty Corporation, 343 Thornall Street, P.O. Box 7817, Edison, New
Jersey 08818-7817 and OPTIMER PHARMACEUTICALS. INC. (&#147;Tenant&#148;) whose address is 10110 Sorrento Valley Road, Suite C, San Diego, California 92121. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>2.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>STATEMENT OF FACTS</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord and Tenant have previously entered into a Lease dated February&nbsp;9, 2011, as amended by a First Amendment to Lease dated May&nbsp;4. 2011 (collectively, the &#147;Lease&#148;) covering 14,196 gross rentable
square feet on the thirty-fifth (35<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;floor (hereinafter referred to as the &#147;Premises&#148;) in the building located at 101 Hudson Street, Jersey City. New Jersey
(&#147;Building&#148;); and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The parties desire to amend certain terms of the Lease as set forth below. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>3.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>AGREEMENT</U> </B></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the terms,
covenants and conditions hereinafter set forth, Landlord and Tenant agree as follows: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The above recitals are incorporated herein by reference. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">All capitalized and non-capitalized terms used in this Agreement which are not separately defined herein but are defined in the Lease shall have the meaning given to any such term in the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>TEMPORARY CONFERENCE ROOM:</U></B> </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">On the date of this Agreement (the &#145;Temporary
Conference Room Delivery Date&#148;), Landlord shall deliver to Tenant and shall permit Tenant to utilize additional space on the thirty-ninth (39th)&nbsp;floor of the Building consisting of approximately 605 rentable square feet, as shown on
Exhibit A attached hereto and made part hereof (the &#147;Temporary Conference Room&#148;), for the use set forth in the Lease until the date upon which Landlord has completed the work in Tenant&#146;s permanent conference room located within the
Premises (the &#147;Temporary Conference Room Expiration Date&#148;). If Tenant fails to vacate and surrender and discontinue the use of the Temporary Conference Room on the Temporary Conference Room Expiration Date, Tenant shall be deemed a
holdover tenant in the Temporary Conference Room and the provisions of Section&nbsp;28.02 of the Lease shall govern, <U>mutatis</U> <U>mutandis</U>. From the date hereof until the date Tenant vacates the Temporary Conference Room, the Temporary
Conference </P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">
Room shall be deemed part of the Premises for purposes of the obligations of the parties with respect thereto, except as set forth herein. In connection with Tenant&#146;s occupancy of the
Temporary Conference Room, the parties hereby agree as follows: </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">a. Tenant shall be required to pay &#147;Temporary Conference Room
Rent,&#148; as that term is defined herein, from and after the date hereof. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">b. Landlord shall deliver the Conference Room to Tenant in its
&#147;As-Is&#148; condition. Any and all alterations and improvements to be made by Tenant to the Temporary Conference Room shall be subject to Landlord&#146;s prior written consent. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">c. Tenant will pay a rental (which shall he deemed additional rent under the Lease) for the Temporary Conference Room in the amount of $600.00
per month (the &#147;Temporary Conference Room Rent&#148;), equitably prorated for partial months. Except for the Temporary Conference Room Rent, Tenant shall have no other obligation to make any payment of rent or additional rent to Landlord of any
nature, except as set forth herein. As such, Tenant shall not be responsible for Tenant&#146;s Share of Taxes and Tenant&#146;s Share of Operating Costs with respect to the Temporary Conference Room. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">d. Tenant covenants and agrees to pay to Landlord the cost of electricity as indicated by a submeter for the entire thirty-ninth
(39th)&nbsp;floor in accordance with Article 4 of the Lease. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">e. Tenant covenants and agrees to pay to Landlord the amount for Chilled
Water as indicated by a submeter measuring the demand for, and consumption of, Chilled Water for the entire thirty-ninth (39<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;floor, pursuant to Section&nbsp;21.04 of the Lease. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">f. Landlord, at Tenant&#146;s sole cost and expense, shall perform cleaning and janitorial services pursuant to Exhibit E of the Lease. </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">g. Tenant shall remove all personal property, telephone and data equipment and wiring from the Temporary Conference Room upon vacating same.
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">h. It is understood that the Temporary Conference Room is part of a larger unit of space (&#147;Larger Unit&#148;) consisting of
approximately 24,179 gross rentable square feet. However, Tenant shall not he required to pay Basic Annual Rent or additional rent applicable to the Larger Unit, except that Tenant shall pay Landlord the cost of Electricity consumed within the
Larger Unit in accordance with Article 4 of the Lease (Electricity). Tenant acknowledges that Landlord shall not be obligated to separately demise the Temporary Conference Room from the Larger Unit and that, until such time as Landlord separately
demises the Temporary Conference Room, Tenant shall be obligated to carry insurance and to indemnify Landlord under the Lease with respect to the Larger Unit. With respect to the Larger Unit, Tenant shall have no rights, benefits, entitlements,
options or privileges, except that if necessary Tenant may traverse through the Larger Unit </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">2 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">
only to the extent necessary (and for no other purpose) to enter in and exit from the Temporary Conference Room. Tenant shall commit no waste in, and shall do nothing to damage, the Larger Unit.
Landlord shall have the right, at any time, in its sole discretion, to erect, at Landlord&#146;s expense, demising walls around the Temporary Conference Room, separate mechanical systems or do such other work as may be necessary to separate the
Temporary Conference Room from the Larger Unit (the &#147;<B>Demising Work</B>&#148;). Tenant agrees that, subject to the prior sentence, any performance by Landlord of the Demising Work shall not constitute an eviction or otherwise entitle Tenant
to any abatement, reduction or modification of the basic annual rent or additional rent due under the Lease. Tenant shall at its expense reasonably cooperate with Landlord during the performance of the Demising Work by relocating all furniture,
fixtures and personnel as necessary. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">i. All monies payable by Tenant under this Agreement shall he deemed additional rent under the Lease.
Such monies shall he paid together with and in the same manner as the Basic Annual Rent under the Lease. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">j. Either party shall have the
right to terminate Tenant&#146;s rights pursuant to this Paragraph&nbsp;3.3 upon thirty (30)&nbsp;days written notice to the other party for any reason or no reason whatsoever. In the event either party exercises such right, Tenant shall vacate and
surrender and discontinue to the use of the Temporary Conference Room and Larger Unit. If Tenant fails to vacate and surrender and discontinue the use of the Temporary Conference Room and Larger Unit, Tenant shall be deemed a holdover tenant in the
Temporary Conference Room and Larger Unit and the provisions of Section&nbsp;28.02 of the Lease shall govern, <U>mutatis</U> <U>mutandis</U>. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant hereby represents to Landlord that (i)&nbsp;there exists no default under the Lease either by Tenant or Landlord; (ii)&nbsp;Tenant is entitled to no credit, free rent or other offset or abatement of the rents due
under the Lease; and (iii)&nbsp;there exists no offset, defense or counterclaim to Tenant&#146;s obligation under the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant represents to Landlord that no broker brought about this transaction and agrees to indemnify and hold Landlord harmless from any and all claims of any broker arising out of or in connection with negotiations of,
or entering into of, this Agreement. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.6</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Except as expressly amended herein, the Lease, as amended, shall remain in full force and effect as if the same had been set forth in full herein, and Landlord and Tenant hereby ratify and confirm all of the terms and
conditions thereof. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.7</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left" STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">Tenant agrees not to disclose the terms, covenants, conditions or other facts with respect to this Agreement, including the Basic Annual Rent and
Additional Rent, to any person, corporation, partnership, association, newspaper, periodical or other entity, except to Tenant&#146;s accountants or attorneys (who shall also be required to keep the terms of this Agreement confidential) or as
required by law. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">3 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">
This non-disclosure and confidentiality agreement will be binding upon Tenant without limitation as to time, and a breach of this paragraph will constitute a material breach under the Lease. In
addition, Tenants employees, contractors, etc. shall keep any of the terms and conditions of this Agreement, including any billing statements and/or any backup supporting those statements, confidential. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.8</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective legal representatives, successors and permitted assigns. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.9</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Each party agrees that it will not raise or assert as a defense to any obligation under the Lease or this Agreement or make any claim that the Lease or this Agreement is invalid or unenforceable due to any failure of
this document to comply with ministerial requirements including, but not limited to, requirements for corporate seals, attestations, witnesses, notarizations, or other similar requirements, and each party hereby waives the right to assert any such
defense or make any claim of invalidity or unenforceability due to any of the foregoing. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">This Agreement may be executed in
multiple counterparts, each of which, when assembled to include an original signature for each party contemplated to sign this Agreement, will constitute a complete and fully executed original. All such fully executed counterparts will collectively
constitute a single agreement. Tenant expressly agrees that if the signature of Landlord and/or Tenant on this Agreement is not an original, but is a digital, mechanical or electronic reproduction (such as, but not limited to, a photocopy, fax,
e-mail, PDF, Adobe image, JPEG, telegram, telex or telecopy), then such digital, mechanical or electronic reproduction shall be as enforceable, valid and binding as, and the legal equivalent to, an authentic and traditional ink-on-paper original wet
signature penned manually by its signatory. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>[SIGNATURE PAGE TO FOLLOW] </B></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">4 </P>

<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have hereunto set their hands and seals the day and year
first above written. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">

<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">1 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><U>THIRD AMENDMENT TO LEASE </U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>PARTIES</U></B> </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">THIS AGREEMENT made the 30<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP> day of September, 2011 is between 101 HUDSON LEASING ASSOCIATES (&#147;Landlord&#148;) whose address is c/o Mack-Cali Realty Corporation,
343 Thornall Street, P.O. 7817, Edison, NJ 08818-7817 and OPTIMER PHARMACEUTICALS, INC. (&#147;Tenant&#148;), whose address is 10110 Sorrento Valley Road. Suite C, San Diego, California 92121. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><U><B>STATEMENT OF FACTS</B></U> </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord and Tenant have previously entered into a Lease Agreement dated February&nbsp;9, 2011, as amended by a First Amendment to Lease dated May&nbsp;4, 2011 and a Second Amendment to Lease dated July&nbsp;5, 2011
(hereinafter collectively referred to as the &#147;Lease&#148;) covering, 14,196 gross rentable square feet on the thirty-fifth (35<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;floor (&#147;Existing Premises&#148;) in the building
located at 101 Hudson Street. Jersey City, New Jersey (&#147;Building&#148;); and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The Term of the Lease expires on June&nbsp;30. 2016 (&#147;Expiration Date&#148;); and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant desires in expand the. Existing Premises by leasing 10,141 gross rentable square feet on the thirty-sixth (36<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;floor of the Building (&#147;Expansion
Premises&#148;), as shown on Exhibit A attached hereto and made a part hereof; and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The parties desire to emend the Term of the Lease for a period to commence on July&nbsp;1, 2016; and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The parties desire to amend certain terms of the Lease as set forth below, </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><U><B>AGREEMENT</B></U> </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the terms,
covenants and conditions hereinafter set forth, Landlord and Tenant agree as follows: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The above recitals are incorporated herein by reference. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">All capitalized and non-capitalized terms used in this Agreement which are not separately defined herein but are defined in the Lease shall have the meaning given in any such term in the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The Term applicable to the Expansion Premises shall commence on the Effective Dare (as defined below) and shall terminate at 11:59 p.m. on the last day of the month during which the day prior to the six (6)&nbsp;year
and two (2)&nbsp;month anniversary of the Effective Date occurs (the &#147;New Expiration Date&#148;). </TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">1 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The effective date applicable in the Expansion Premises (the &#147;Effective Date&#148;) shall be the earlier of (i)&nbsp;the day Landlord substantially completes the improvements to be made to the Expansion Premises in
accordance with Exhibit B attached hereto and made part hereof and Landlord has received all necessary inspection sign-offs to allow Tenant to legally occupy the Expansion Premises or (ii)&nbsp;the date Tenant or anyone claiming under or through
Tenant shall occupy the Expansion Premises. The estimated Effective Date is the target substantial completion date shown in the project schedule attached as Exhibit C. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">From and after the Effective Date, the following shall be effective: </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">a.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord shall lease to Tenant and Tenant shall hire from Landlord the Expansion Premises as shown on Exhibit A attached hereto and made part hereof. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">b.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The &#145;Demised Premises&#148;, &#147;demised premises&#148; and &#147;Premises&#148; shall be defined as 24,337 gross rentable square feet consisting of 14,196 gross rentable square feet on the thirty-fifth (35<SUP
STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;floor and 10,141 gross rentable square feet on the thirty-sixth (36<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;floor of the Building, and the Lease shall be deemed amended
accordingly. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">c.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">In addition to the Basic Annual Rent payable applicable to the Existing Premises, Tenant shall pay Landlord Basic Annual Rent applicable to the Expansion Premises which shall accrue as follows and paragraph (h)&nbsp;of
the Reference Page to the Lease shall be deemed amended accordingly: </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">
