</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:13%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Notwithstanding the foregoing, provided that this Lease is in full force and effect and Tenant is not in
default beyond any applicable notice and cure period. Tenant shall have no obligation to pay the Monthly Installments of Basic Annual Rent applicable to the Expansion Premises for the first
(1<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">st</SUP>)&nbsp;and second (2<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">nd</SUP>)&nbsp;full calendar months of the Term applicable to the Expansion Premises. Tenant shall remain liable for the
Monthly Installments of Basic Annual Rent with respect in the Existing Premises for such months. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:13%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">If the Effective Date is a day other to
the first day of a calendar month, then the Monthly Installment of Basic Annual Rent payable by Tenant for such month shall be prorated at the same rental rate payable for the First
(1<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">st</SUP>)&nbsp;Monthly Installment listed above. </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">2 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">d.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant&#146;s Tax Share applicable to the Expansion Premises shall be .84% and paragraph (i)&nbsp;of the Reference Page to the Lease shall be deemed supplemented accordingly. Tenant&#146;s Expense Share applicable to
the Expansion Premises shall be .87% and paragraph (k)&nbsp;of the Reference Page to the Lease shall be deemed supplemented accordingly. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">e.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant shall pay to Landlord as Additional Rent Tenant&#146;s Tax Share and Tenant&#146;s Expense of taxes applicable to the Expansion Premises of the cost to Landlord for each of the categories set forth in Article 3
<U>Additional Rent of the Lease</U> above the current Base Tax Year and Base Operating Year, as applicable. Tenant shall continue to pay Landlord Tenant&#146;s Tax Share and &#145;Tenant&#146;s Expense Share applicable to the Existing Premises
of-faxes and Operating Expenses pursuant to Article 3 of the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">f.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant&#146;s Electricity Share for the Expansion Premises shall be deemed to be 33% and Paragraph (q)&nbsp;of the Reference Page to the Lease shall tie deemed supplemented accordingly and Tenant shall pay its Electric
Share applicable to the Expansion Premises in accordance with Article 4 <U>Electricity</U> of the Lease. Tenant&#146;s Electricity Share for the Existing Premises shall remain unchanged and Tenant shall pay the cost of electricity consumed within
the demised premises in accordance with Article 4 <U>Electricity</U> of the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">g.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant&#146;s Chilled Water Share for the Expansion Premises shall be deemed to be 33% and Paragraph (u)&nbsp;of the Reference Page to the Lease shall be deemed supplemented accordingly and Tenant shall pay its Chilled
Water She applicable to the Expansion Premises in accordance with Article 21 <U>Services and Equipment</U> of the Lease, Tenant&#146;s Chilled Water Share for the Existing Premises shall remain unchanged and Tenant shall pay the cost of chilled
water consumed within the demised premises in accordance with Article 21 <U>Services and Equipment</U> of the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">h.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The number of Tenant&#146;s Vehicles shall be increased to sixteen (16)&nbsp;and Paragraph (o)&nbsp;of the Reference Page to the Lease shall be deemed amended accordingly. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.6</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The Term applicable to the Existing Premises shall be extended for a period commencing on July&nbsp;1, 2016 and expiring at 11:59 p.m. on the New Expiration Date (&#147;Extension Term&#148;) and paragraphs (f)&nbsp;and
(g)&nbsp;of the Reference Page to the Lease shall be deemed amended accordingly. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.7</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord hereby leases to Tenant and Tenant hereby hires from Landlord the Existing Premises in its &#147;AS-IS&#148; condition for the Extension Term, as defined herein, under the terms and conditions set forth herein.
Landlord shall have no obligation to perform any tenant improvement work in the Existing Premises except as referenced to in Exhibit 8 of this Third Amendment. </TD></TR></TABLE>

newspaper, periodical or other entity, except to Tenant&#146;s employee, accountants or attorneys (who shall also be required to keep the terms of this Agreement confidential) or as required by law. This non-disclosure and confidentiality agreement
will be binding upon Tenant without limitation as to time, and a breach of this paragraph will constitute a material breach under this Agreement and the Lease. In addition, Tenant&#146;s employees, contractors, etc. shall keep any of the terms and
conditions of this Agreement, including any billing statements and/or any backup supporting those statements, confidential. </TD></TR></TABLE>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Each party agrees that it will not raise or assert as a defense to any obligation under the Lease or this Agreement or make any claim that the Lease or this Agreement is invalid or unenforceable due to any failure of
this document to comply with ministerial requirements including, but mil limited to, requirements for corporate seals, attestations. witnesses, notarizations, or other similar requirements, and each party hereby waives the right to assert any such
defense or make any claim of invalidity or unenforceability due to any of the foregoing. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">This Agreement may be executed in
multiple counterparts, each of which, when assembled to include an original signature for each party contemplated to sign this Agreement, will constitute a complete and fully executed original. All such fully executed counterparts will collectively
constitute a single agreement. Tenant expressly agrees that if the signature of Landlord and/or Tenant on this Agreement is not an original, but is a digital, mechanical or electronic reproduction (such as, but not limited to, a photocopy, fax,
e-mail, PDF, Adobe image, JPEG, telegram, telex or telecopy), then such digital, mechanical or electronic reproduction shall be as enforceable, valid and binding as, and the legal equivalent to, an authentic and traditional ink-on-paper original wet
signature penned manually by its signatory. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Landlord and Tenant have hereunto set their hands and seals the date and
year first above written, and acknowledge one to the other that they possess the requisite authority to enter into this transaction and to sign this Agreement. </P>

<IMG SRC="g128818stamp225_page09.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
 </P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><U>EXHIBIT B </U></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>LANDLORD&#146;S WORK </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>NOTES </B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">RE:</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Workletter Agreement for office space on the 36<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP> floor at 101 Hudson Street, Jersey City, New Jersey. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">September&nbsp;30, 2011 </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">TENANT: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">OPTIMER PHARMACEUTICALS, INC. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">You (&#147;Tenant&#148;) and we
(&#147;Landlord&#148;) are executing a written lease amendment (&#147;Amendment&#148;), covering the space referred to above, as more particularly described in the Amendment (&#147;Premises&#148;). </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">With respect to the construction work being conducted in or about the Expansion Premises, each party agrees to be bound by the approval and actions of their
respective construction representatives. Unless changed by written notification, the parties hereby designate the following individuals as their respective construction representatives: </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="92%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" ALIGN="center">

<TD VALIGN="bottom">FOR TENANT</TD></TR>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">To induce Tenant to enter into the Agreement (which together with the Lease are hereby incorporated by reference) and to
consideration of the covenants hereinafter contained, landlord and Tenant mutually agree as follows: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord, at its sole cost and expense, shall have its architect prepare the following architectural and mech.-ink-al drawings and specifications based upon the sketch layout supplied to Landlord by Tenant, attached
hereto and made a part hereof, upon full execution of this Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">a.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Architectural drawings and specifications for Tenant&#146;s partition layout, reflected ceiling, placement of electrical outlets and other installations for the work to be done by Landlord. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">b.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Mechanical plans and specifications where necessary for installation of air conditioning systems, ductwork and heating. All such plans and specifications are expressly subject to Landlord&#146;s written approval, which
Landlord covenants it will not unreasonably withhold. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord agrees to cause the partition plan, electrical plan, HVAC zoning plan and the reflected ceiling plan to be delivered to Tenant on or before the fifteenth
(15<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;day after Tenant&#146;s approved sketch layout. Tenant agrees to approve said plans by initialing and returning same to Landlord within five (5)&nbsp;business days of receipt of each
plan. Upon approval of the plans initialed by Tenant, Landlord shall the said plans with the appropriate governmental agencies. </TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">1 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord agrees, at its sole cost and expense and without charge to Tenant finless otherwise provided), to do the work in the Expansion Premises as shown on the plans attached hereto and described on the
&#147;Description of Materials&#148; schedule attached hereto which shall hereinafter be referred to as &#147;The Work&#148;. The Work shall include any and all costs to install necessary public corridors and demising walls as necessary and as shown
in Exhibit A Floor Plan. The Work shall include Landlord&#146;s general conditions and overhead amounts indicated on the Description of Materials. &#147;Building Standard&#148; shall mean the type and grade of material, equipment and/or device
designated by landlord as standard for the Building. All items are Building Standard unless otherwise noted. The provisions of Article 6 of the Lease shall apply to any alterations made to the Expansion Premises after the initial work to be
performed herein. Landlord shall deliver the Expansion Premises to Tenant on the Effective Date with all bulk-line systems servicing the Expansion Premises in proper working order. Landlord shall warranty that the Work be free of defects for a
period of one (1)&nbsp;year from the Effective Date, except to the extent any portion of the Work is damaged or becomes defective as a result of any misuse or neglect by Tenant. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">4.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Intentionally omitted </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">5.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">All low partitioning, workstation modules, bank screen partitions and prefabricated partition systems shall be furnished and installed by Tenant. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">6.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The installation or wiring of telephone and computer (data) outlets is not part of The Work. Tenant shall bear the responsibility to provide its own telephone and data systems at Tenant&#146;s sole cast and expense.
Upon expiration or sooner termination of the Lease, Tenant shall remove all telephone and data equipment from the Expansion Premises upon vacation of same. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Tenant shall not he required to remove any of its wiring at
the expiration or earlier termination of the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">7.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Changes in The Work, if necessary or requested by the Tenant, shall be accomplished after submission of tenant&#146;s final approved sketch layout, by written agreement between Landlord and Tenant hereinafter referred
to as a Change Order and without invalidating any part of the Lease or Workletter Agreement. Each Change Order shall be prepared by Landlord and signed by both Tenant and Landlord stating their agreement upon all of the following: </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">a.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The scope of the change in The Work; and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">b.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The cost of the change; and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">c.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Manner in which the cost will he paid or credited; and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">d.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The estimated extern of any adjustment to the Effective Date (if any) as a result of the change in The Work. </TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">2 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Each and every Change Order shall be signed by Landlord&#146;s and Tenant&#146;s respective
construction representatives. In no event shall any Change Order(s) be permitted without such authorizations: A 7.5% supervision plus 7.5% overhead charge will be added to the cost of any Change Order and to the cost of any other work to be
performed by Landlord in the Expansion Premises after Landlord&#146;s completion of The Work if Tenant shall fail to approve any such Change Order within one (1)&nbsp;week, the same shall be deemed disapproved in all respects by Tenant and Landlord
shall not be authorized to proceed thereon. Any increase in the cost of The Work or the change in The Work stated in a Change Order which results front Tenant&#146;s failure to timely approve and return said Change Order shall be paid by the Tenant.
Tenant agrees to pay to Landlord the cost of any Change Order promptly upon receipt of an invoice for same. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">8.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">If Tenant elects to use the architect suggested by Landlord, this architect becomes the Tenant&#146;s agent solely with respect to the plans, specifications and The Work, if any change is made after completion of
schematic drawings and prior to completion of final construction documents which result in a Change Order and additional costs, such costs shall be the responsibility of the Tenant. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">9.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Ten (10)&nbsp;business days prior to Tenant&#146;s occupancy of the Expansion Premises, Tenant shall be provided the opportunity by Landlord to identify and list any portion of The Work which does not conform to this
Workletter Agreement (&#147;Punch List&#148;). The landlord shall review with the Tenant all of the items so listed and correct or complete any portion of The Work which fails to conform to the requirements of this Workletter Agreement.
</TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">10.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The terms contained in the Agreement (which include all exhibits attached thereto) constitute Landlord&#146;s agreement with Tenant with respect to the work to be performed by Landlord on Tenant&#146;s behalf. If the
architectural drawings are in conflict with the terms of the Agreement, then the Lease shall be deemed the controlling document. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">11.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">All materials and installations constructed for the Tenant within the Expansion Premises shall become the property of the Landlord upon installation. No refund, credit or removal of said items is to be permitted at the
termination of the Lease. Items installed that are not integrated in any such way with other common building materials do not fall under this provision (e.g,&nbsp;shelving, furniture, etc.). </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">12.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">It is agreed that notwithstanding the date provided in the Lease for the Effective Date, the term applicable to the Expansion Premises shall not commence until Landlord has &#147;substantially completed&#148; all work
to be performed by Landlord in the Expansion Premises as hereinbefore set forth in Paragraph 3 above and as set forth in the Amendment; provided, however, that if Landlord shall he delayed in substantially completing said work as a result of:
</TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">a.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant&#146;s failure to approve the plans and specifications in accordance with Paragraph 2 hereof; or </TD></TR></TABLE>

<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">b.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant&#146;s failure to furnish interior finish specifications, i.e., paint colors, carpet selection, etc., to Landlord by the fifth (5<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;working day after
Landlord has approved the plans and specifications submitted by Tenant referred to in Paragraph 2 hereof; or </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">c.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant&#146;s request for materials, finishes or installations other than Landlord&#146;s Building Standard; or </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">d.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant&#146;s changes in The Work; or </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">e.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The performance of a person, firm, partnership or corporation employed by Tenant and the completion of the said work by said person, firm, partnership or corporation; </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">then the Effective Date of the term of said Lease shall be accelerated by the number of days of such delay and tenant&#146;s obligation to pay
Basic Annual Rent and Additional Rent shall commence as of such earlier date. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">13.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord shall permit Tenant and its agents to enter the Expansion Premises at least two (2)&nbsp;weeks prior to the Effective Date in order that Tenant may perform through its own non-union contractors (or union
contractor if required by Landlord) such other work and decorations as Tenant may desire al the same time Landlord&#146;s contractors are working in the Expansion Premises. The foregoing license to enter prior in the Effective Date, however, is
conditioned upon: </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">a.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant&#146;s workmen and mechanics working in harmony and not interfering with the labor employed by Landlord, Landlord&#146;s mechanics or contractors or by any other Tenant or its mechanics or contractors; and
</TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">b.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant providing Landlord with evidence of Tenant&#146;s contractors and subcontractors carrying such worker&#146;s compensation, general liability, personal and property insurance as required by law and in amounts no
less than the amounts set forth in Article 9 of the lease. If at any time such entry shall cause disharmony or interference therewith, this license may be withdrawn by Landlord upon forty-eight (48)&nbsp;hours written notice to Tenant. Such entry
shall be deemed controlled by all of the terms, covenants, provisions and conditions of said Lease, except as to the covenant to pay Basic Annual Rent and Additional Rent. Except in the event of Landlord, its agents or employees gross negligence or
intentional misconduct, Landlord shall not be liable in any way for any injury, loss or damage which may recur to any of Tenant&#146;s decorations or installations so made prior to the Effective Date, the same being solely at Tenant&#146;s risk.
</TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">14.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">No part of the Expansion Premises shall be deemed unavailable for occupancy by the Tenant, nor shall any work which the Landlord is obligated to perform in such part of the Expansion Premises be deemed incomplete for
the purpose of any adjustment of Basic Annual Rent payable hereunder, solely due to the non-completion of details of construction, decoration or mechanical adjustments which are minor in character and the non-completion of which does not materially
interfere with the Tenant&#146;s beneficial use and occupancy of such part of the Expansion Premises. </TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">4 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">15.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant is responsible for all costs related to the repairs and maintenance id any additional or supplemental HVAC systems, appliances and equipment installed to meet Tenant&#146;s specific requirements. Tenant shall
purchase a service contract for this equipment so that the equipment is covered by such service contract each year of the term of the Lease and shall forward a copy of such contract to Landlord. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">16.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">If construction is to occur in a space occupied by Tenant&#146;s employees, Tenant shall be liable for all costs associated with a delay if Tenant shall fail to comply with a submitted construction schedule to relocate
personnel, furniture, or equipment. Tenant shall relocate such personnel, furniture and equipment at its sole cost and expense. In the event Tenant fails to comply with a submitted construction schedule following notice thereof by Landlord, and to
the extent Landlord&#146;s contractors are delayed as a result hereof, Tenant shall he responsible for the costs, which shall include, but not be limited to the following: </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">a</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">reasonable and actual cost of construction workers time wasted (upon reasonable evidence thereof); and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">b.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">reasonable and actual cost of any overtime work necessary to meet schedule deadlines; and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">17.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">This workletter is based on the quantities and specifications listed herein. Any change to these specifications shall require the recalculation of the construction costs. Such recalculation shall not negate any other
section of this Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">18.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">All sums payable by Tenant to Landlord in connection with this Exhibit B and any other work to be performed by Landlord within the Expansion Premises and billable to Tenant shalt be deemed Additional Rent.
</TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">-END- </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">5 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>EXHIBIT B </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TR VALIGN="TOP">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right"><B>Drwg. Date </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">Workletter

<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">&#134;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Cross (&#134;) indicates non-Building Standard items </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>The following work is excluded:</B>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Communications Work, Tele/Data </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Security and Access Systems </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Office Furniture, Equipment, and Appliances </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Modular Partitions and Work stations </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:8%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Overtime except For work in adjacent tenant .spaces or public we of the building </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Dishwashers are not allowed </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Undercounter ice makers are not allowed </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Existing window blinds to be cleaned and repaired as required </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Existing space to be demolished as required </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">5 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Estimate based on drawing, SK-3 dated 8/16/11 as prepared by John J. Perkins, PC </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Millwork in existing pantry to be removed and plumbing capped </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">New upper and base cabinets to be installed in new pantry adjacent to toilet </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Existing doors, frames and hardware to be reused to the extent possible </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">New doors, frames and hardware are to match the existing </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">New pan of Herculite glass doors to be installed at entrance </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Film to be removed From existing glass entrance door and sidelite </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Existing glass sidelites to remain </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">New glass sidlites to match the existing are to be installed at new offices and conference room </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Demising partition is existing except at new entrance door. Demising partition to be deck high insulated and </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Interior drywall partitions to be ceiling high without sound insulation except as noted below </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Conference room pqartition to be deck high and insulated </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Two sheets of plywood to he mounted in telephone room to mount communications equipment </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Existing ceiling tile and grid to be removed and replaced with building standard 2&#146;x4&#146; Second look tile in star </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">New and existing drywall surfaces to be painted. Vinyl wall covering is not included </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Wood doors and hollow metal frames are to be finished to match the existing </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">IT closet to receive vinyl composition tile and vinyl cove base </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Break room and pantry to receive vinyl composition tile and vinyl cove base </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Ceramic floor tile in private toilet to remain </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Remainder of the space to receive building standard loop pile carpet </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Provide new sink and trim in pantry </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Fire sprinklers to be added or relocated as required for new layout </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Building standard HVAC system to be modified as needed For new tenant layout </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">CEO office to have separate VAV box and wall mounted thermostat </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Conference room to have separate VAV box with wall mounted thermostat </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">No special or supplemental HVAC systems are included. Tenant to confirm requirements </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Existing light fixtures to be replaced with deepcell parabolic fixtures 2&#146; x 4&#146; </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">No special lighting systems or fixtures are included </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Duplex wall receptacles to he installed as per tenant&#146;s requirements </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Where possible existing outlets to be reused </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Duplex floor receptacle to be installed in conference room </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Two dedicated circuit wall receptacles to be installed for office equipment </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Power Feeds are included for modular partition work stations. An allowance of 3 wall and 3 floor feeds </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Exit and emergency lights to be installed as per code requirements </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Fire alarm devices to be installed as per code requirements </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Empty conduit run from 35th to 36th floor is included </P>

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">2 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><U>FOURTH AMENDMENT TO LEASE </U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><U><B>PARTIES</B></U> </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">THIS AGREEMENT made the 17<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP> day of July, 2012 is between 101 HUDSON LEASING ASSOCIATES (&#147;Landlord&#148; whose address is c/o Mac-Cali Realty Corporation, 343
Thornall Street, P.O. 7817, Edison, NJ 08818-7817 and OPTIMER PHARMACEUTICALS, INC. (&#147;Tenant&#148;), whose address is 10110 Sorrento Valley Road, Suite C, San Diego, California 92121. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><U><B>STATEMENT OF FACTS</B></U> </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord and Tenant have previously entered into a Lease Agreement dated February&nbsp;9, 2011, as amended by a First Amendment to Lease dated May&nbsp;4, 2011 and a Second Amendment to Lease dated July&nbsp;5, 2011
(hereinafter collectively referred to as the &#147;Lease&#148;) covering 14,196 gross rentable square feet on the thirty-fifth (35<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;floor (&#147;Existing Premises&#148;) in the building
located at 101 Hudson Street, Jersey City, New Jersey (&#147;Building&#148;); and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord and Tenant entered into the Third Amendment to Lease dated September&nbsp;30, 2011 whereby Landlord leased to Tenant and Tenant hired from Landlord 10,141 gross rentable square feet on the thirty-sixth (36<SUP
STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;floor of the Building (&#147;Expansion Premises&#148;). </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The Effective Date applicable to the Expansion Premises is the earlier of (i)&nbsp;the day Landlord substantially completes the improvements to be made to the Expansion Premises in accordance with Exhibit B attached to
the Third Amendment to Lease and Landlord has received all necessary inspection sign-offs to allow Tenant to legally occupy the Expansion Premises or (i it the date Tenant or anyone claiming under or through Tenant shall occupy the Expansion
Premises: and </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">It has been determined in accordance with the provisions of Article 3.4 of the Third Amendment to Lease that May&nbsp;18, 2012 is the Effective Date of the Term applicable to the Expansion Premises. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><U><B>AGREEMENT</B></U> </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the Premises and
the covenants hereinafter set forth. Landlord and Tenant agree as follows: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The above recitals are incorporated herein by reference. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">All capitalized and non-capitalized terms used in this Agreement which are not separately defined herein but are defined in the Lease shall have the meaning given to any such term in the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The Effective Date of the Term applicable to the Expansion Premises is May&nbsp;18, 2012 and the New Expiration Date thereof is July&nbsp;31, 2018. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">This Agreement is executed by the parties hereto for the purpose of providing a record of the Effective and New Expiration Dates of the Expansion Premises, adjusting the Term of the Lease and basic annual rent amount
accordingly. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant hereby represents to Landlord that (i)&nbsp;there exists no default under the Lease either by Tenant or Landlord; and (ii)&nbsp;there exists no offset defense or counterclaim to Tenant&#146;s obligation under the
Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.6</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Except as amended herein, the Lease covering the Premises shall remain in full force and effect as if the same were set forth in full herein and Landlord and Tenant hereby ratify and confirm all the terms and conditions
thereof. </TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">1 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.7</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective legal representatives, successors and permitted assigns. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.8</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Each party agrees that it will not raise or assert as a defense to any obligation under the Lease or this Agreement or make any Claim that the Lease or this Agreement is invalid or unenforceable due to any failure of
this document to comply with ministerial requirements including, but not limited to, requirements for corporate seals, attestations, witnesses, notarizations, or other similar requirements, and each party hereby waives the right to assert any such
defense or make any claim of invalidity or unenforceability due to any of the foregoing. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.9</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant&#146;s failure to sign this Agreement and return same to Landlord within ten (10)&nbsp;days after Tenant&#146;s receipt of this Agreement shall be deemed to be Tenant&#146;s acceptance of the Effective Date and
Expiration Date as stated in this Agreement. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">This Agreement may be executed in multiple counterparts. each of which, when
assembled to include art original signature for each party contemplated to sign this Agreement, will constitute a complete and fully executed original. All such fully executed counterparts will collectively constitute a single agreement. Tenant
expressly agrees that if the signature of Landlord and/or Tenant on this Agreement is not an original, but is a digital, mechanical or electronic reproduction (such as, but not limited to, a photocopy, fax, e-mail, PDF, Adobe image, PDF, telegram,
telex or telecopy), then such digital, mechanical or electronic reproduction shall be as enforceable, valid and binding as, and the legal equivalent to, an authentic and traditional ink-on-paper original wet signature penned manually by its
signatory. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">IN WITNESS THEREOF, Landlord and Tenant have hereunto set their hands and seats the date and year first above written and
acknowledge one to the other they possess the requisite authority to enter into this transaction and to sign this Agreement. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">LANDLORD: </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">101 HUDSON LEASING ASSOCIATES </P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><U>SURRENDER AND ACCEPTANCE AGREEMENT </U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.0</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>PARTIES</U></B> </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">THIS AGREEMENT made this 10th day of December, 2014 is between 101 HUDSON LEASING ASSOCIATES (&#147;Landlord&#148;) whose address is c/o Mack-Cali Realty Corporation, 343 Thornall Street, Edison, New Jersey 08837-2206
and OPTIMER PHARMACEUTICALS, INC. (&#147;Tenant&#148;), with an address at 10110 Sorrento Valley Road, Suite C, San Diego, California 92121. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.0</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>STATEMENT OF FACTS</U></B> </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord and Tenant have previously entered into a Lease Agreement dated February&nbsp;9, 2011, as amended by a First Amendment to Lease dated May&nbsp;4, 2011, a Second Amendment to Lease dated July&nbsp;5, 2011, a
Third Amendment to Lease dated September&nbsp;30, 2011, and a Fourth Amendment to Lease dated July&nbsp;17, 2012 (hereinafter collectively referred to as the &#147;Lease&#148;) covering 24,337 gross rentable square feet consisting of 14,196 gross
rentable square feet on the thirty-fifth (35<SUP STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;floor (the &#147;14,196 Premises&#148;) and 10,141 gross rentable square feet on the thirty-sixth (36<SUP
STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>)&nbsp;floor (the &#147;10,141 Premises&#148;) (collectively, the &#147;Existing Premises&#148;) in the building located at 101 Hudson Street, Jersey City, New Jersey (&#147;Building&#148;); and
</TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">2.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant wishes to surrender and vacate the 14,196 Premises prior to the Lease expiration date of July&nbsp;31, 2018 in accordance with Article 28 of the Lease; and </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">The parties desire to amend certain terms of the Lease as set forth below: </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.0</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><B><U>AGREEMENT</U></B> </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the 14,196 Premises and the
covenants hereinafter set forth, Landlord and Tenant agree as follows: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">All capitalized and non-capitalized terms used in this Agreement which are not separately defined herein but are defined in the Lease shall have the meaning given to any such term in the Lease. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left" STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">Tenant does hereby agree to surrender and vacate the 14,196 Premises in the condition called for in the Lease on or before 11:59 P.M. on
December&nbsp;31, 2014 (the &#147;Surrender Date&#148;) and to pay Landlord, as additional rent, on or before the Surrender Date the surrender fee of $824.129.99 (&#147;Surrender Fee&#148;), as well as to pay Basic Annual Rent and additional rent
for the 14,196 Premises through the Surrender Date. If Tenant does not surrender and vacate the 14,196 Premises on the Surrender Date, then, Tenant&#146;s possession shall be deemed a holdover tenancy and the terms of Article 28 of the Lease shall
apply. except that: (i)&nbsp;the reference to one hundred fifty percent (150%)&nbsp;in Sections 28.02.(a)(1)-(2)&nbsp;of the Lease shall </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">1 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">
be deemed increased to two hundred percent (200%)&nbsp;and (ii)&nbsp;the thirty (30)&nbsp;day grace period referenced on line twelve (12)&nbsp;of Section&nbsp;28.02, of the Lease shall be
inapplicable. Tenant hereby acknowledges that, at its sole cost and expense, Tenant is required to perform in strict accordance with all applicable terms of the Lease, including, but not limited to. Articles 6 and 8 of the Lease, all work necessary
to disconnect and remove by the Surrender Date all fiber optic security cables, teledata cables and any other cables or wiring that connect between the 14,196 Premises and the 10,141 Premises (collectively, the &#147;Wire/Cable Removal Work&#148;).
Tenant hereby requests that Landlord perform the Wire/Cable Removal Work on behalf of Tenant. Landlord and Tenant agree that Tenant shall not perform the Wire/Cable Removal Work and that Tenant&#146;s aforementioned obligation to perform the
Wire/Cable Removal Work shall be waived upon payment by Tenant to Landlord of the Surrender Fee. Tenant hereby grants landlord and its agents unfettered and unrestricted access to the Existing Premises so that Landlord may perform or cause to be
performed the Wire/Cable Removal Work. Tenant: (i)&nbsp;shall bear all risk of loss with regard to any damage, injury, disruption or inconvenience in the Existing Premises that may arise in connection with the Wire/Cable Removal Work,
(ii)&nbsp;assumes all liability for the performance, or lack thereof, of the Wire/Cable Removal Work and (iii)&nbsp;releases Landlord from all damages of any kind (including, but not limited to, damages that are direct and indirect, foreseeable and
unforeseeable, consequential and actual) related to the performance, or lack thereof, of the Wire/Cable Removal Work. Landlord agrees that the contractor retained by Landlord to perform the Wire/Cable Removal Work on behalf of Tenant
(&#147;Wire/Cable Removal Contractor&#148;) shall he obligated to carry insurance that complies with all applicable requirements set forth in Section&nbsp;6.01 of the Lease, including, but not limited to, those requirements mandating the Wire/Cable
Removal Contractor to furnish certificates of insurance naming Landlord and Tenant as additional insureds. In addition, Landlord agrees that the Wire/Cable Removal Contractor shall be required to indemnify Tenant in accordance with
Section&nbsp;6.01.9. of the Lease. If the Wire/Cable Removal Contractor causes any damage or injury for which Tenant is liable to Landlord under this Section&nbsp;3.3, then, Landlord agrees that, after its receipt of a written notice from Tenant
referencing this sentence. Landlord shall assign to Tenant Landlord&#146;s claim against such Wire/Cable Removal Contractor, but such assignment shall in no event diminish or release Tenant&#146;s liability to Landlord for any such damage or injury
caused by the Wire/Cable Removal Contractor. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left" STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">Landlord agrees to accept Tenant&#146;s surrender of the 14,196 Premises on the Surrender Date and to release Tenant and its successors and assigns
effective on the Surrender Date from and against all claims, obligations and liabilities of every kind and nature whatsoever under the Lease arising out of or in connection with any occupancy, acts and/or omissions of Tenant that occur in the 14,196
Premises after the Surrender Date. provided: (i)&nbsp;Tenant is not in default of the Lease; (ii)&nbsp;prior to the Surrender Date, Landlord receives the Surrender Fee: and (iii)&nbsp;the 14,196 Premises is delivered to Landlord in the condition
required by Section&nbsp;3.3 hereof and by Article 28 of the Lease as if the Surrender Date was the last day of the term. Effective on the Surrender Date, Tenant releases Landlord and its
</P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">2 </P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">
successors and assigns from and against all claims, obligations and liabilities of every kind or nature whatsoever arising out of or in connection with the 14,196 Premises. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Landlord and Tenant acknowledge that Tenant is required by the Surrender Date to remove from the 14,196 Premises all inventory, trade fixtures, equipment and all other personal property (collectively, the
&#147;Contents&#148;) and to clean the 14,196 Premises so it is in broom clean condition on the Surrender Date (collectively. the &#147;Contents Removal Work&#148;). Tenant hereby requests that Landlord perform the Contents Removal Work on behalf of
Tenant. Landlord and Tenant agree that Tenant is relieved from its obligation to perform the Contents Removal Work upon payment by Tenant to Landlord of the Surrender Fee and that Tenant shall not perform the Contents Removal Work. Tenant hereby
grants Landlord and its agents unfettered and unrestricted access to the 14,196 Premises so that Landlord may perform or cause to he performed the Contents Removal Work. Upon the Surrender Date, Tenant shall he deemed to have relinquished all right,
title and interest in the Contents and to have conveyed to Landlord unencumbered and perfected title to the Contents, without Tenant having any entitlement to compensation therefor from Landlord. Tenant represents, warrants and covenants that it is
the absolute owner of the Contents and has unencumbered and perfected title, free of any liens, financing statements, chattel mortgages or other security interests, to the Contents. Tenant assumes strict liability for, releases Landlord from and
indemnities and holds Landlord harmless against any claims, liabilities, obligations or expenses arising directly or indirectly from any claim of ownership or title to all or any of the Contents asserted by a third (3<SUP
STYLE="font-size:85%; vertical-align:top">rd</SUP>)&nbsp;party. Landlord agrees that the Contents being conveyed by Tenant to Landlord on the Surrender Date shall be conveyed in their then &#147;as-is&#148; physical condition and state of repair. To
evidence Landlord&#146;s continuing ownership of and title to the Contents, Tenant shall, upon Landlord&#146;s demand and at Tenant&#146;s sole cost, execute and deliver to Landlord any and all confirmatory documents, hills of sale or other legal
instruments in form and content satisfactory and acceptable to Landlord. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.6</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">This Agreement shall in no way amend or modify the lease as it applies to the 10,141 Premises, and all terms with respect to the 10,141 Premises shall remain in full force and effect, including, but not limited to, the
existing Expiration Date of July&nbsp;31, 2018 and Tenant&#146;s obligation to pay basic annual rent and additional rent with respect to the 10,141 Premises. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.7</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Prior to the Surrender Date. Landlord may show the 14,196 Premises to prospective purchasers and mortgagees and tenants during Building Hours. Landlord or any prospective tenant shall have the right to enter the space
to perform inspections, surveys, measurements or such other reasonable activities as may be necessary to prepare the 14,196 Premises for occupancy by any succeeding tenant. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.8</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left" STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt">Tenant acknowledges its obligation to pay Basic Annual Rent and additional rent (whether or not said sums shall have been fixed as of the Surrender
Date) </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">3 </P>

<TD WIDTH="8%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">

(if any) and Tenant shall promptly make up any underpayment (if any). This provision shall survive the Lease termination applicable to the 14,196 Premises. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">As of the Surrender Date, the number of Tenant&#146;s Vehicles shall be reduced to nine (9)&nbsp;and Section (o)&nbsp;of the Reference Page to the Lease shall he deemed amended accordingly. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.11</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">If (a)&nbsp;the appointment of a receiver to take possession of all or substantially all of the assets of Tenant, or, (b)&nbsp;a general assignment by Tenant for the benefit of creditors, or, (c)&nbsp;any action taken
or suffered by Tenant under any insolvency or bankruptcy act or the U.S. Bankruptcy Code occurs, and the payment of all or any portion of the Surrender Fee or any other sum paid by Tenant to Landlord under the Lease is deemed to be avoidable under
applicable provisions of Sections 544 through 553 of the Bankruptcy Code or other similar state or federal insolvency or reorganization act by a final nonappealable judgment, then the Lease shall automatically he deemed reinstated and in full force
and effect as if this Agreement shall not have been executed by the parties. and Landlord shall be entitled to all of the rights and privileges of a creditor/Landlord of Tenant with respect to the Lease pursuant to the applicable state law and/or
the U.S. Bankruptcy Code, including, but not limited Section&nbsp;506(b) of the U.S. Bankruptcy Code, or other similar state or federal insolvency or reorganization act. </TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.12</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant represents and warrants to Landlord that no broker, other than Cushman&nbsp;&amp; Wakefield of New Jersey, Inc. (&#147;Broker&#148;), brought about this transaction, and Tenant agrees to indemnify and hold
Landlord harmless from any and all claims of any broker, including Broker, arising out of or in connection with negotiations of, or entering into of, this Agreement. In addition, Tenant shall pay Broker when due any commission that may he earned by
and/or payable to Broker in connection with this Agreement. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.13</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Tenant agrees not to disclose the terms, covenants, conditions or other facts with respect to this Agreement, including the Basic Annual Rent and additional rent, to any person, corporation, partnership, association,
newspaper, periodical or other entity, except to Tenant&#146;s accountants or attorneys (who shall also be required to keep the terms of this Agreement confidential) or as required by law. This non-disclosure and confidentiality agreement will be
binding upon Tenant without limitation as to time, and a breach of this paragraph will constitute a material breach by Tenant under this Agreement and the Lease. In addition, Tenant&#146;s employees, contractors, etc. shall keep all of the terms and
conditions of this Agreement, including all billing statements and/or any backup supporting those statements, confidential. </TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">4 </P>

thereof. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.16</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">Each party agrees that it will not raise or assert as a defense to any obligation under the Lease or this Agreement or make any claim that the Lease or this Agreement is invalid or unenforceable due to any failure of
this document to comply with ministerial requirements including, but not limited to, requirements for corporate seals, attestations, witnesses, notarizations, or other similar requirements, and each party hereby waives the right to assert any such
defense or make any claim of invalidity or unenforceability due to any of the foregoing. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">This Agreement may be executed in
multiple counterparts, each of which, when assembled to include an original signature for each party contemplated to sign this Agreement, will constitute a complete and fully executed original. All such fully executed counterparts will collectively
constitute a single agreement. Tenant expressly agrees that if the signature of Landlord and/or Tenant on this Agreement is not an original, but is a digital, mechanical or electronic reproduction (such as, but not limited to, a photocopy, fax,
e-mail. PDF, Adobe image, JPEG, telegram, telex or telecopy), then such digital, mechanical or electronic reproduction shall be as enforceable, valid and binding as, and the legal equivalent to, an authentic and traditional ink-on-paper original wet
signature penned manually by its signatory. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; text-indent:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Landlord and Tenant have hereunto set their hands the date and year first
above written, and acknowledge one to the other that they possess the requisite authority to enter into this transaction and to sign this agreement. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
